document.full_text: the global 3d television market will grow more than 5-fold to account for 11 percent of flat-screen tv sales this year, as prices fall sharply and manufacturers add the function as an add-on feature, research firm ihs isuppli predicted on friday.
document.title: global 3d tv market to grow 5-fold in 2011: isuppli
lines_and_colors: the global 3d television market will grow more than 5-fold to account for 11 percent of flat-screen tv sales this year, as prices fall sharply and manufacturers add the function as an add-on feature, research firm ihs isuppli predicted on friday.
